mapper.insert: insert into schedule_board(sched_num, sched_info, sched_prog, sched_seq, project_num) values(schedule_seq.NEXTVAL, #{sched_info}, 0, #{sched_seq}, #{project_num})
mapper.select: select sched_num, sched_info, sched_seq, project_num from schedule_board where sched_prog=0
